home.title: EOS Account Generator
home.include: Include: 4Kb RAM | Stake 0.15 EOS for CPU | Stake 0.05 EOS for Net bandwidth
home.step1: Step 1: Input and verify the account name your want to register.
home.step2: Step 2: Please generate your key pairs for the new account.
home.step3: Step 3: Generate account and transfer EOS to complete it.
home.step1_intro: EOS Account names must be exactly 12 characters long and consist of lower case characters and digits from 1 to 5.
home.step3_intro1: Make an EOS token transfer with the following data:
home.step3_intro2: Amount: Any amount, but has to be bigger than
home.step3_intro3: EOS. If you transfer less than the required minimum amount or any other error occurs, the transferred funds will be automatically refunded by the smart contract. If you transfer more than required, the remaining balance will be forwarded to your newly created account.
